forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
